data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
In the minute 1, Soren Storks awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
Can Wolfsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Freiburg's half?
In the minute 4, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Wolfsburg's Joao Victor gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 6, Freiburg have a goal kick.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg are pushing forward but Daniel Ginczek's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Soren Storks signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Goal! A Nils Petersen header gives Freiburg a 1-0 lead in Freiburg.
In the minute 11, Vincenzo Grifo with an assist there.
Wolfsburg are coming forward and Maximilian Arnold gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Soren Storks awards Freiburg a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Freiburg to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wolfsburg's Joao Victor gets in a shot on goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Throw-in Freiburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
In the minute 20, Soren Storks signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Freiburg's half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 23, Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
In the minute 25, Soren Storks signals a free kick to Freiburg just outside Wolfsburg's area.
In Freiburg Freiburg drive forward through Vincenzo Grifo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Soren Storks signals a throw-in for Freiburg, close to Wolfsburg's area.
In the minute 26, Can Freiburg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Christian Gunter of Freiburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Soren Storks awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
Freiburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Soren Storks awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Soren Storks signals a free kick to Freiburg.
Paulo Otavio (Wolfsburg) has received a yellow card from Soren Storks.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lucas Holer.
Freiburg's Lucas Holer looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick Freiburg.
In the minute 33, Maximilian Arnold is booked for the away team.
In the minute 34, At Schwarzwald-Stadion, John Brooks has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Freiburg are caught offside.
Soren Storks signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Freiburg's half.
In the minute 36, Freiburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Freiburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Wolfsburg.
Goal! Josip Brekalo equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Freiburg close to the penalty box.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Wolfsburg.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Wolfsburg pushes forward through Yannick Gerhardt, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 48, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Joao Victor for Wolfsburg who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
It seems as if Joao Victor is unable to continue. Renato Steffen replaces him for the away team.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 50, Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Wolfsburg in Freiburg.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the away team in Freiburg.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 57, Lucas Holer for Freiburg is whistled offside.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
The away team replace Maximilian Arnold with Xaver Schlager.
In the minute 58, Admir Mehmedi is replacing Yunus Malli for Wolfsburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Free kick for Freiburg in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 60, Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Soren Storks awards the home team a throw-in.
Freiburg's Christian Gunter misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 61, Soren Storks awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
Soren Storks signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Freiburg's half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Wolfsburg.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Freiburg drive into the zone and Baptiste Santamaria is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 65, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Freiburg.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 68, Free kick in a good position for Freiburg!
Freiburg's Jonathan Schmid misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Wolfsburg needs to be cautious. Freiburg have an attacking throw-in.
Freiburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 74, Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
Dominique Heintz for Freiburg drives towards goal at Schwarzwald-Stadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Freiburg, Baptiste Santamaria of Freiburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 75, Play has been interrupted briefly in Freiburg to check on Paulo Otavio, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Paulo Otavio for Wolfsburg is back on the field again.
In the minute 76, Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Soren Storks.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
The away team have replaced Daniel Ginczek with Wout Weghorst. This is the fifth substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
In the minute 77, The away team has substituted Paulo Otavio with Jerome Roussillon. Oliver Glasner is thus making his fourth change.
Baptiste Santamaria (Freiburg) strikes at Schwarzwald-Stadion but his header is cleared.
Christian Streich (Freiburg) is making a first substitution, with Chang-Hoon Kwon replacing Vincenzo Grifo.
In the minute 79, Christian Streich is making the team's second substitution at Schwarzwald-Stadion with Woo-yeong Jeong replacing Roland Sallai.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Soren Storks awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, The match at Schwarzwald-Stadion has been interrupted briefly for a check on Josuha Guilavogui, who is down injured.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Wolfsburg’s Josuha Guilavogui is on his feet again at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Soren Storks signals a throw-in for Wolfsburg, close to Freiburg's area.
Throw-in for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 86, Wolfsburg are coming forward and Josip Brekalo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Soren Storks awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Free kick Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Ermedin Demirovic is replacing Nils Petersen for the home team.
Wout Weghorst (Wolfsburg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Soren Storks signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Freiburg.
Freiburg are pushing forward but Baptiste Santamaria's finish is wide of the goal.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Freiburg drive forward but Woo-yeong Jeong is judged offside.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Dominique Heintz is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Christian Streich (Freiburg) is making a fourth change, with Manuel Gulde replacing the possibly injured Dominique Heintz.
